title: Sonos SUB
description:
Sonos SUB will take your whole Sonos wireless HiFi system one seismic step closer to the spine-curling, jaw-dropping, full body experience music was meant to be. The Sonos SUB will fill an entire room with thick layers of bottomless sound that let you hear and feel every chord, kick, splash, and roll. And it all starts with the simple touch of a button.

Sonos Your Home 
All your music in every room in amazing HiFi sound. Wirelessly.  

Abt is a proud authorized retailer of Sonos Home Audio products. Shop for the Sonos SUB and the full line of Sonos Home Audio products at Abt!
